---
title: "Report Name"
author: "Brady Rippon, MS"
pi: "Investigator Name"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
footer_message: ""
knit: (
    function(inputFile, encoding) {
      out_dir   <- here::here("reports");
      title     <- "title";
      sd        <- format(Sys.Date(), "%Y-%m-%d");
      out_file  <- paste0("[ ", sd, " ] ", title, ".html");
      rmarkdown::render(
        inputFile,
        encoding = encoding, 
        output_file = file.path(out_dir, out_file)
      ) 
    }
  )
output: 
  wcmtheme::wcm_html: 
    toc: true
    toc_float: true
